refactorings_applied: DRY: Extracted duplicated truncateBranch function to shared truncateString utility

Added comprehensive unit tests for truncateString function
commits: dc41b2b: refactor(#111): extract truncateString utility for DRY compliance

message: Refactoring completed successfully. Extracted truncateString utility to eliminate code duplication (DRY). All 2290 tests pass. No ESLint or TypeScript errors.
